ygData.msgSnippet: dex does not affect attack speed whatsoever.  absolute irrefutable truth. ... From: Elijah Meeker [mailto:elijah@nemesysmusic.com] Sent: Thursday, May 18, 2000
ygData.messageBody:
dex does not affect attack speed whatsoever. absolute irrefutable truth.

-----Original Message-----
From: Elijah Meeker [mailto:elijah@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 18, 2000 12:01 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Blade of Fiery Lamentations


Hmmm, one more question. My dex is hovering somewhere about 107 down from
about 117 due to focusing on AC. Now that I will be weilding dual daggers I
am thinking about speed again. Does anyone know if there is a "magic
number" close by at which point I would have a big speed increase, or am I
just looking at diminishing returns the higher I go?

Tszaaz
